document.full_text: carlos boozer scored 23 points and derrick rose had 12 assists, leading the bulls to a rout of the atlanta hawks and an eastern conference finals matchup against the heat.
document.title: bulls 93, hawks 73: chicago advances to first conference final since '98
lines_and_colors: carlos boozer scored 23 points and derrick rose had 12 assists, leading the bulls to a rout of the atlanta hawks and an eastern conference finals matchup against the heat.
